item.title: Version 0.2.121
item.description:
What's New in 0.2.121

# Version 0.2.121 Release Notes

Features

  • Introduced new functionality for enhanced user experience.
  • Added support for customizable settings, allowing users to tailor the application to their needs.

    • Improvements

  • Optimized performance for quicker load times and a smoother interaction.
  • Enhanced user interface for better accessibility and ease of navigation.

    • Fixes

  • Resolved several minor bugs to improve overall stability.
  • Fixed issues related to notifications not displaying correctly.

    • View full release notes
